title: SPECIAL: Slash Pictorial
body:
From Dan to Slash in 10 minutes flat


This is what I typically look like on any given day of the week. Bright-eyed, bushy-tailed, and wearing mocassins.


The first step on the road to becoming Slash is removing my hat.


Step 2 is more of a mental process - to become Slash on the outside, I must first rid my psyche of all things non-Slash. Does Slash smile and give a thumbs up all the time? No. Slash only has one expression, and this is it.


It took me 10 minutes to squeeze into these pleather pants, and 15 to get them off. Note how my skin gets progressively paler as my clothes grow darker.


How SWEET is this shirt? It's actually the product of two shirts sewn together by the lovely and talented Nicole.


Here's a detail shot of the shirt. In reality, I doubt Slash would ever wear a shirt with a picture of Axl brandishing his crotch in a pair of red leather hot pants, but come on... this shirt is AWESOME!


The safety pins held my sleeves up to ensure optimal bicep exposure.


As you can see, the original shirt's color was more navy than black, which, in my opinon, makes the shirt even cooler.


Here's a nice shot of my virgin bicep - sans tattoo. Please take a moment to notice how the 4 moles on my arm form a perfect arrow pointing down to my pleather pants.


Here I am using a yellow dish sponge to apply my fake tattoo. My arms smelled like taco meat for the rest of the evening... just like Slash!


Here's tattoo #1 - the burning rose.


And here's tattoo #2 - the big rose with decorative lines placed between the moles that form an arrow pointing down to my pleather pants.


Here I am with my new tattoos and brown socks.


Add boots, which, like the pleather pants, were far too small.


The wrist studs help accentuate my bad ass-ness.


With my black aviator glasses and 5-day beard stuble I could almost pass for George Michael or...


Benny, the gay biker bar boy with a double chin!


My Benny joke didn't go over well with Bogart, so I have to take a moment to explain it to him in more detail.


This is actually a jumbo afro wig that I bundled together at the top to make it a tad less afro-like. You know, without my hat on, I look a little like a Monet haystack. Bogey is still confused about the Benny joke.


The top hat fits perfectly over the fro bundle and pushes just enough hair over my face to obscure it from view. Please note the HUGE chunk of fro hair hanging above my left sholder
.


Here's a detail shot of the top hat. We used a strip of material from the Axl shirt and stapled foil-covered cardboard circles to it. Nothing funny about that.


With the addition of the fake cigarette, the costume in now complete... complete with a GIANT hair chunk over my left shoulder, that is. Is it just me, or did it grow since the last picture?


Here's a close-up of one of the fake cigarettes I used. Quite realistic, eh? They even puffed out smoke when you blew into them, but I used up all the fake smoke within 30 seconds of receiving them in the mail.


Here I am, as Slash, playing air guitar. There's two things you should notice about this picture: 1) Although I look more like I'm holding an imaginary shotgun than a guitar, I DID manage to form the C chord with my left hand. 2) There's an unusal spectral-looking target hovering over my crotch.

Action shots


Here's Slash chilling out on a bean bag in a dungeon. Please note the second cigarette stashed in my hair and the fact that my right leg is twice as long as the rest of my entire body.


Slash. Dark. Fog. Coolness.


Here's Slash with an unidentified Boston Red Sox fan.


Slash sits down to a meal of beer and stew.

Company Costume Contest


Slash arrives to the company costume contest and surveys the area for likely competition.


Slash makes his way to the front of the cafeteria, while the women talk about his unnaturally taut bottom.


Slash stops for a moment to flex his buttocks.


Slash knows that eating during the costume judging is strictly prohibited, but Slash doesn't care. It's a CAFETERIA for Christ's sake!


This super close-up zoom shot catches Slash as he slips out through the back to get more food.


I'd like to take a moment to thank Bjork, my little Swan Princess, for being patient enough to take a bunch of silly pictures of me.


This picture doesn't do justice to Nicole's entire costume. It's all handmade, except for the wig, which Nicole pinned up into 3 little Bjork bobs all along the back.


THE END
author: Dan

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: dude. i could've done without that last shot. time to load up on booze and sleeping pills.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Dave: you know you liked it.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: i did.

comments.author: whitty
comments.body: okay, i went through the slash pictorial with three people watching over my shoulder and my sister on the phone.  please come to springfield soon.  we need something to do on a rainy halloween night.  sigh.

comments.author: Luke
comments.body: And Slash didn't win?  Surely there is no justice in the world.  You were up against what, scarecrows, and it looks like Dorothy from The Wizard of Oz, a cafeteria lady in green, and some kind of weird clown?  Totally bogus!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body:
Whitty: we'll be down before you know it!

Luke: me losing the costume contest was just another example of the man trying to keep Slash down! PATHETIC!

comments.author: Whittler
comments.body: You was robbed! I like the transmogrification. Kind of like Jeff Goldblum in the Fly.

comments.author: John
comments.body:
You were starting to look like Rob Halford there for a while.

Not that I would recommend it, but if you really wanted to start "being" Slash, you would have shot up some heroin and banged some groupies.

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: That last shot will haunt me for ever...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body:
Whittler: Thanks. It's funny you mention that, b/c parts of my costume kept falling off all night... just like Jeff Goldblum's ear!

John: I was going to draw heroin tracts on my arms and bring a "loose groupie" with me to the party, but Nicole wouldn't have it.

Fyse: you know you liked it.

comments.author: einahpets
comments.body: Ah, the tears in my eyes. Tears of jealousy. Nic doesn't know how good she has it with that hot peice of ace.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Nicole bounces quarters off of it on a semi-regular basis.

comments.author: Dan Tobin
comments.body: Your Slash costume is infinitely better than mine was in '96.  Although I didn't need no stinkin' wig for it back then.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Thanks Dan!

comments.author: Oz
comments.body:
Even Slash would have the fashion sense to know that black, pleather pants do NOT go with brown leather boots. What's your problem, man? You dissin' Slash? You givin' him a bad name?

Luckily, you have made up for it with the Axel Rose crotch shot t-shirt. Pure gold, baby, pure gold.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Oz: Come on, those boots weren't just BROWN, they were REDDISH brown!

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Hey Dan; thanks for stopping by.  You made a great Slash...you even managed to pull off the herion-chic look!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Thanks Stephanie!

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: Wow.  I am so in love with Dan and Nicole.  If only there was a picture of you playing a guitar on train tracks.  I can't believe you lost.  Nicole, you are my crafty hero.

comments.author: blacky
comments.body:
you gotta be kiddin' me !
what was that ????
what in the name of all what is good and pure is this clown trying to do ??
HOW DARE YOU MUTTAFU***R ??
if this teenager, all he wanted was to get some atention , believe me ,he's gotta do something better than trying to bring down someone else's image,
'cuz that was was loser stuff,totally !!
feel free to answer me clown ,
not just for nuthin i hate these damn faggots . . . how can you be so shameless??

comments.author: M
comments.body: Dude.......You are so pathetic!!

comments.author: Adam
comments.body: Don't listen to them dude, I thought this was totally kick ass... Keep on keeping on Bro!

comments.author: Jez
comments.body:
hey yea...slash totally rules....and i am from england....o yea and blacky or who ever the fuck you r...shut the F*ck up you M*ther F*cker slash rules and it was only a competition so dont take it so serious you dick wad! lame brain cum stain...hey that rhymes and you know it does!
bitch.....keep on rocking there Dan...
from Jez

comments.author: Emilie
comments.body:
Haha, this was just fuckin' funny! Could be because I'm soooo tired.. It's in the middle of the night here right now, and I saw Guns yesterday!! I have the right to be tired.

But like I said, you rock, man!

comments.author: Rebecka
comments.body:
Haha!omg,so funny rofl :D
fuckin great!and all your little comments under each pic,hahaha :D
I saw Guns yesterday too,with Emilie. Fuckin great show,even if Slash wasn't there. ;)
